A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie fails on delivering the answers to the questions asked in Episode 7\, merely brushing them off the screen. The main plot is dull with pseudo scientific explanations so forced that it becomes painfully illogical. Some of the new characters are great and others not so much. In the end the movie was tailor made for non fans and young viewers\, new to the franchise. I started with mixed feelings and ended up very disappointed.
